snippet: In just four days, Invisible Children's 30-minute documentary film has rocketed around the Web, garnering more than 40 million views on YouTube and more than 13 million on Vimeo.
abstract: In just four days, Invisible Children's 30-minute documentary film has rocketed around the Web, garnering more than 40 million views on YouTube and more than 13 million on Vimeo.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and JENNIFER PRESTON

headline.main: How the Kony Video Went Viral
